deshapalanakaranaya awama wuna polis sewayak,mathiwarana komisamak,adhikarana yanthranayak,rajya sewayak oone karanne balaya ayuthu widihata bhawitha karala mathiwarana asadharana widihata pawathwana eka awama karaganna.ee wage shishta sampanna yanthranayan serama ahosi karala hama ratema me wage thamayi kiyana eka balaye inna thuru joli.namuth oya mahinda rajapakshalama heta wipakshayata thallu wunoth swadhina komishan wala awashyathawaya gana udghoshanaya karanu daka ganna puluwan weyi.ada mewaye awashyathawaya gana kathakarana obalage prathimallawa yuenpiya edata ada obala kiyana dewal ee widihatama punaruchcharanaya karawi.

anuradhapura, rambaawa pradeshayedi mema anathura sidu wa thibenawa.apa yuripotar malkan madhupathum sandahan kale margaye gaman gath yathuru padiyak ha motar rathayak gati mema anathura sidu wi athi bawayi.anathurin yathuru padikaru thuwala laba rambaawa rohalata athulath kirimen pasu wadi dura prathikara…

mulin ma jathyanthara mattame chitha්rapatayak lankawe karannata haki bawa penwa dima da, dewanuwa, sinhala chitha්rapata kirimata dakunu indiyanu chitha්ragarawalata yama awashya nowana bawa penwa dima da, thunwanuwa, sinhala chitha්rapata jathyantharawa labana kirthiya wicharaka pa්rashansawa nisa ee chitha්rapata wanijamaya athin sarthaka wiya haki bawa penwa dima mehidi ohu dakina pa්radhana karunu thuna we.

pasugiya janadhipathiwaranayedi nithigaruka palanayak wenuwen eekarashi wu pirisa samanga ekwa ema aramunu wenuwen katayuthu karana bawada ehi kandawumkaru mahacharya sarath wijesuriya mahatha sandahan kaleya.

aya wisin nirmanaya karana lada upahasathmaka saha hasyajanaka sithuwam athara, "sadahatama antharjalaye" sitinnan lesa handunwana warthamana parapura muhuna dena manasika pidanaya pilibandawa da athulak kara atha.
aththatama samaja madhyayan kiyanne nawa sankalpiya ha thakshanika kramaya matha padanamwela nirmanaya karagaththa antharjalaya mulika karagath yedawum kandayak hatiyata handuna ganna puluwan.

pa්rathijiwaka aushadha digu kalayak digatama labadimen, keti kalinawa labadimen athpath kara gannawata wada wadi pa්rathipala athnowana athara digukalina bhawithaya pa්rathijiwaka mbarushadhawalata oroththudimata baktiriyawalata athi hakiyawa wardhanaya karana bawa ema adhyayanawalin anawaranayawe.
ema pariganaka gatha kirima sidu kala samagama wisin shri lankawe miliyana 21 k wana janathawata ee-helth kadipatha hadunwadimata yojana kara thibenawa.

amarikanu bhata sankhyawa wadi kota sidukerena mema hamuda wihiduma yukthi sahagatha karamin angaharuwada niw yok tayims puwath patha pala kala warthawakata anuwa, emagin amarikanu bhatayanta satan peramunata wadath lanwa, siya afghan sahakaruwanta wada hondata “guruharukam” dimata ida salasanu atha.
mama oyalata ada aran aawe supiri ganaye china yudha chithrapatayak.

awuruddakata rupiyal laksha hayak, ee kiyanne masayakata rupiyal 50,000k ganna ayata 4%ka baddak aya karanawa.
mema manthriwarun athara janaka bandara thennakon, chamal rajapaksha, mahindananda aluthgamage, kumara welgama yana mahathwarun athulu aasana sanwidhayakawarun 12 denek wethi.

thuru palatha, nangenahira ha uthuru mada palathe lamayin 525 kage sahabhagithwayen lama kandawurak pawathwima , ema daruwan wenuwen waidya sayana pawathwima, chithra kathika ha owunge nirmana kusalatha eli dakwime tharaga pawathwima, sharirika suwatha wadasatahan pawathwima, lama peraharak pawathwima saha sanskruthika rathriyak pawathwima ada (01) da aarambha wana lama kandawuredi sidu kerenu atha.wishwa lama dina themawa padanam kara ganimin rupiyal 05ka watinakamakin yuthu muddarayak ha muldina kawarayak nikuth kirima mema 03 da janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha athin jathika uthsawayedi sidu kirimata niyamithaya.lama sanwardhana aramudala wenuwen wu lama kodi masaye mulma kodiya janadhipathithumanta palandawima , loka lama dina wishesha samaru kalapaya nikuth kirima anuradhapura disthrikkaye dushkara pasal 05 sandaha mudal aadhara labadima , ema disthrikkaye pasal lamun 50 kata adhyapana shishyathwa pirinamima, wishwa lama dinayata samagamiwa pawathwu nirmana tharagawaliye jayagrahakayinta thyaga ha sahathika pradanayada mema uthsawayedi janadhipathithuman athin sidu kere.lamayinge nawa thakshana nirmana kusalatha eli dakwana pradarshanayak mema 02 da swarnapali balika widuhaledi pawathwima , lama hinsanaya awama wu lama ayithiwasikama surakshitha kala hondama aadarsha gammanayata sammana labadima, pradeshiya mattamin pawathwu hondama lama samajaya therime tharagaye jayagrahakayanata sammana pradanayada mewara wishwa lama dina jathika uthsawayedi sidu kirimata niyamithaya.mema jathyanthara lama dina jathika uthsawayata lama sanwardhana ha kantha katayuthu amathi thissa karalliyadda ema niyojya amathi em.el. ee. em. hisbullah mahatha athulu pradeshaye mathi amathiwaru rasakda, ema amathyansha niladharihuda sahabhagi wethi.

samanya panathak sammatha kara ganimatawath wipakshaye sahayogaya laba ganima hariyata ibbagen pihatu illanawa wage wadak.ese thibiyadi me udugan pihinima sabawin ma wishmaya janakayi.ranil wika්ramasinha mahatha pasugiya dawasaka kala pa්rakashayak wipakshaya udugan bala yana bawata sithimata hethuwak wuna.

wira kappetipola charithaya merata janathawata wisheshayen tharuna parapura wetha aaweshya kirima, kappetipola disawe wisin udarata giwisuma sinhala bhashawen assan kirima ismathu kirima, mangin mawubasata athi wadagathkama thahawuru kirima aadiwasin wisin wellassa nidahas aragalaya aarambha kirima mangin owun jathika samangiyata dun nayakathwaya agaya kirima, aagamwadayen thorawa jathikawadaya thahawuru kirima, shri lankawe jathika wirayan sambandhayen kauthukagarayak idikirima udesa sahaya labaganima, kappetipola wiruwa sambandhayen keti chithrapata natya, gadya rachana, padya rachana ha chithra tharaga sanwidhana kirimada mehi aramuna wana bawada hethema sandahan kaleya.
